property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can only play a total of 3 creatures or spells each turn. ■ When this creature would leave, if it has more than 0 power, it stays instead. TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Angel Commands from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.value: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Angel Commands from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature , choose a creature card name except 'Emotional Hardcore, Sacred Dragon'. ■ Ignore any abilities of creatures that have the chosen name. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, if you have another Oracle, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or it attacks, you may cast a spell that has "shield trigger" from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, after you cast, shieldify it face up instead of your graveyard. ■ Whenever you cast a spell, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than that spell and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.
